name: Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is fantastic ,stayed there 3 weeks 26th April- 17th May 2010 , can not find anyhing to fault this hotel ,,, staff are very friendly and really helpful ,always somebody on front desk 24/7 ,,free tea & coffee all day , very clean ,pool very nice 2 hot tubs ,,
reviews.title: !!!!!!!!! awsome !! !fantastic !!! superb !!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: plenty of parking spaces ,, very good location , Premium outlets 2mins away , Crossroads 5mins , Downtown Disney 5mins , Wal mart 5mins, Universal ,Seaworld ,Aqatica , I Drive , 15mins ( driving time ) Gas station straight across road ,
reviews.title: A little worn around the edges but overall okay

reviews.text: This hotel also has the village - Pizza hut , Starbucks , chicken take away & sub sandwiches
reviews.title: Superb Hotel in ideal Disney location, great value & great service!!!

reviews.text: And not forgetting '''' Bahama Breeze super cocktails & dinning "" also Golden Corral all you can eat ,, ""I'boking again for next year !!!!!! wahoo cant wait !!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: Fantastic Stay!!

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for one night, after seeing Star Wars in Concert at the Amway arena (excellent, by the way). I am well versed on the different Marriott hotels, and this one was okay. We stayed in a jacuzzi suite. The room was nice but seemed a bit worn around the edges. Plenty of mildew present in the shower, which I did not appreciate. The bed was typical super comfy Marriott style, and the whirlpool tub was quite enjoyable. This place is very congested, and it took us about 20 minutes on Saturday night to get out of the hotel and vicinity to go to a restaurant that was 1.1 miles away. Very annoying. I've stayed in much nicer Marriotts, but with the chaos that is Orlando this was all an all an okay place.
reviews.title: Recommended hotel - Excellent staff

reviews.text: Upgraded from Fairfield Inn which is part of this 3 hotel complex after being informed Fairfield was full - I had booked 6 months earlier. Advised this was an upgrade - WRONG. The Marriott may have a nice entrance but the rooms are only marginally larger.
reviews.title: Not that good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were put on the 4th floor in a room that looked onto a wall and was situated next to the cleaners store room, 8am every morning we were awoken by trolleys banging of the door as they pushed them out.
reviews.title: Excellant Value and well located

reviews.text: At the weekend this complex attracts groups of soccer teams the weekend we stayed it was overexcited teenage girls, the two rooms opposite ours were occupied by some of these they screamed, shouted, ran between their rooms and the doors banged late at night and early am. When we complained to the reception they asked if we wanted to move room, WHY? we were not causing the problem why should we suffer the inconvienence of repacking, moving and unpacking again. Besides we were worried what the next room upgrade would be like, the cellar?, Couldn't understand that logic they should have moved the people causing the nuisance.
reviews.title: Probably would not stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had an idea the 4th floor was a bit grubby and on the day we were leaving all the rooms were emptied and workmen started some maintenance or refurb - Upgrade I don't think so.
reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!!

reviews.text: The management were made fully aware of our observations during the stay, no one bothered to speak with us.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel, would definately go back!

reviews.text: I stayed at the Courtyard lake buena vista to celebrate my birthday. Wow what a comfortable friendly hotel. It was absolutely spotless. The rooms were very comfortable and were always cleaned well.
reviews.title: Great hotel, wonderful staff.

reviews.text: I emailed the hotel before my stay to say that it was my birthday during my stay. I received an immediate reply and was given a really nice room with a balcony overlooking the pool.
reviews.title: Superb location for visiting Disney World

reviews.text: The staff were always friendly and very helpful. nothing was too much trouble.
reviews.title: Overall amazing for the price

reviews.text: i liked the fact that the swimming pools were open til 11pm and the gymnasium was open 24 hours a day.
reviews.title: Be aware at Marriott!!!!

reviews.text: The security at the hotel was superb. The room key would open all the entrances and gave access to the indoor pool and laundrettes. They would not have been accessible to anyone not staying at the hotel.
reviews.title: Great hotel, would come again

reviews.text: We had a wonderful Holiday last year at the Marriott.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel and wonderful holiday!

reviews.text: The staff were so helpful and so friendly. We booked this hotel because of its price we normally spend a bit more when going to Florida (we stayed in the animal kingdom one year) and we found that the marriott hotel to be less money and it was just as beautiful and would definatley return! although we do like trying different hotels.
reviews.title: Nice Comfortable Hotel

reviews.text: The Marriott is a set of 3 hotels the Springhill,Fairfield and ours the Courtyard in a circle with a lovely fountain in the centre.
reviews.title: Third time at this Hotel and stiil WOW

reviews.text: The rooms are lovely and spacious with large comfy beds, pillows ect. We ate our breakfast on the balcony which was nice! The bathroom was nice (always clean towels and toiletries,nice shower too! We hired a car and there was always parking for disabled. The pool was lovely which went indoors and there were two hot tubs one inside one out and lots of sunbeds and tables. A lovely stay!
reviews.title: Friendly Friendly Friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hotel was very nice. Qutie large bedroom and and an enormous bathroom. The pool areas are great and always plenty of towells available. The beds were very comfy and I especially loved the tacky pineapple light stands in the rooms. Free Internet and a great bar available in the Lobby and a huge buffet breakfast is a bargain at $4.95.
reviews.title: Marriott will never fail you

aka: Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista In The Marriott Village Hotel
description: This gated hotel community offers kids' programs.
